EmailTemplate.name: TPS EMAIL NOTIFICATION TEMPLATE
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Request URGENT:Your Insurance information needs updating
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Business_Registration__c.Account__c},
Thank you for participating in the SunPower Installation Partner Program and for your investment in changing the way the world is powered.
One of the requirements of the SunPower Third Party Sales (TPS) Program is to keep your enrollment information up to date. As such, the below field is expired, expiring, or incomplete in {!Business_Registration__c.Billing_State__c}:
General Liability Expiry: {!Business_Registration__c.Site_General_Liability_Exp__c}
Lapsed insurance and licenses can prevent shipment and installation, as well as logins for your company will be disabled.
NOTE: SunPower must be named on each policy and in the Certificate Holder section of the ACORD format. Please use the following address:
SunPower Corporation 1414 Harbour Way South Richmond, CA 94804 Attn: Blake Gailey
Please also make sure to send a copy of all documents to Ma.Cristina.deBorja@sunpowercorp.com,RAcompliance@sunpowercorp.com, and copy your RSM.
Thank you for attention and help on this matter.
